applyTo: "**/*.ts,**/*.tsx"
---

# Project Structure Instructions

Use React,Antd,React Query, and Tailwind CSS

Use TypeScript

Use Pnpm

Use Rsbuild

## Project Structure

```
lynx-proxy/
├── public/                   # Public assets
│   ├── locales/              # Localization files  
├── src/                      # Source code
│   ├── components/           # Reusable components
│   ├── hooks/                # Custom hooks
│   ├── routes/               # Application routes
│   ├── services/             # API services
